definitions.definition: A solid or hollow sphere, or roughly spherical mass.
definitions.example: a ball of spittle; a fecal ball

definitions.definition: (mildly, usually in the plural) A testicle.
A leather-covered cushion, fastened to a handle called a ballstock; formerly used by printers for inking the form, then superseded by the roller.
A large pill, a form in which medicine was given to horses; a bolus.
To form or wind into a ball.
To heat in a furnace and form into balls for rolling.
To gather balls which cling to the feet, as of damp snow or clay; to gather into balls.
definitions.example: The horse balls; the snow balls.

definitions.definition: (usually in present participle) To be hip or cool.
To punish by affixing a ball and chain

definitions.example: I had a ball at that concert.

definitions.definition: Speaking or acting with bravado to achieve (something)

definitions.example: It is balls cold out there.
